entry.title: Monday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers becoming mixed with flurries before morning. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low plus 2.
